raw_body:
DE SILVA,​ RATNA – Daughter of late Edward (Snr) and Flora,​ loving sister of late Soma,​ Leela,​ Edward and late Jayawathie,​ passed away. Remains will lie at Mahinda Funeral Parlour,​ Mount Lavinia on Friday,​ 19th January for viewing from 2-8 p.m. Cremation at Galkissa Cemetery on Saturday,​ 20th January at 10 a.m.
004562
